name: THE RITUAL (Ryabcev Pavel)
description:
A small game in the genre of classic horror that will tell you about a man who decided to get rid of the human body and its weaknesses. Find out what he did for this and get rid of the threat that he carries.

Features:

-The incredible atmosphere of an old house that makes you shiver.

-Freedom of choice. You can safely leave the house and finish your investigation.

-Beautifully crafted sounds.
